works.description:
Several articles that I've written in the entertainment space, covering TV, Movies and Video Games have been copied and placed on other sites. 

These sites that copy indexes all my articles and is ranking higher in the search results for these articles. It's a gross violation of our copyright and the work that we put out. 

These sites have no contact forms, no way to ask for the work's removal.
The entire article that was written by author Melody Simpson has been copied and placed on another site, word for word as if they wrote it.
